name: Amelie's Room
description:
Amelie has moved into a new place. 

Her room is very cozy, and she has everything she needs. If she doesn't have something, she can ask the kind voice and she will get it. It truly is very, very comfortable.

Amelie...

... does not need to leave.

A short, linear RPGMaker game made in one day.  Look around, and maybe more than once.

Are you going to make Amelie leave? There is no reason to, is there?
